entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 March 2023
